Joke.Title: Exam
Joke.Text: Just failed my French exam, they deducted me 10% for using deodorant.

Joke.Title: Women
Joke.Text: 2 women sitting at a table quietly.

Joke.Title: Women
Joke.Text: Q. Why do women defy the laws of gravity?
A. Because the heavier they get the easier they are to pick up.
